hiveArticle.title: Digital Art using PicsArt Software
hiveArticle.body:
So just like normal days I got a Photo of Sunset and then tried to do something different with the photo. That is by modifying it with PicsArt Software. You get tons of options but the below one I liked the most.

### Original Photo

![IMG_20180117_175756.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmdmAeDyiZoVt61nW1VqvBY9wdqV2zWebr3TDYfkZ18Kcz/IMG_20180117_175756.jpg)

### Modified with PicsArt

![PicsArt_01-17-06.00.54.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmSwPanhZ8V8W5nug8dpL1GBCnyNyXJytumnin3oq8BJm5/PicsArt_01-17-06.00.54.jpg)
